mapper.select: SELECT confirmed_number AS confirmedNumber, suspected_number AS suspectedNumber, severe_number AS severeNumber, cure_number AS cureNumber, death_number AS deathNumber, overseas_import_number AS overseasImport FROM domestic_epidemic_situation WHERE record_time >= DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( NOW( ), '%Y-%m-%d' ), INTERVAL 10 DAY )

SELECT province_name AS provinceName, sum( confirmed_number ) AS confirmedNumber, sum( suspected_number ) AS suspectedNumber, sum( severe_number ) AS severeNumber, sum( cure_number ) AS cureNumber, sum( death_number ) AS deathNumber, sum( overseas_import_number ) AS overseasImportNumber FROM epidemic_provinces_situation WHERE DATE( record_time ) = CURDATE( ) GROUP BY province_name

SELECT new_death_number AS newDeathNumber, new_confirmed_number AS newConfirmedNumber, new_cure_number AS newCureNumber, new_overseas_import_number AS newOverseasImportNumber FROM domestic_epidemic_situation WHERE DATE( record_time ) = CURDATE( );

SELECT hubei_death_number, not_hubei_death_number, hubei_cure_number, not_hubei_cure_number, hubei_confirmed_number, not_hubei_confirmed_number FROM epidemic_distribution WHERE DATE( record_time ) = CURDATE( );

SELECT province_name as provinceName, sum( new_confirmed_number + new_overseas_import_number) AS total FROM ( SELECT * FROM epidemic_provinces_situation WHERE DATE( record_time ) = CURDATE( ) ) E GROUP BY province_name ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT area_name, ( confirmed_number + overseas_import_number ) AS total FROM epidemic_provinces_situation WHERE DATE( record_time ) = CURDATE( ) ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 10
